p: In this study, we found that suppression of the IRAK/NF-ÎºB, IRAK/AP-1, and TBK1/IRF3 signaling pathways is associated with the inhibitory effect of DCEO on inflammatory mediators in LPS-stimulated RAW264.7 macrophages ( Figure 8). These findings provide a pharmacological justification for the use of Dingchuan tang in managing inflammatory disorders, as Dingchuan tang is traditionally used for treating asthma, which is typically characterized by an eosinophilic inflammation. 13, 66 In the future, we will use asthma models to determine the impact of DCEO on eosinophilic inflammation.
